section.heading: Underwriting contract required with title insurer.
section.text: A person acting in the capacity of a title insurance producer shall not place business with a title insurer unless there is in force a written contract between the parties which sets forth the responsibilities of each party, and, if both parties share responsibility for a particular function, specifies the division of the responsibilities.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2129 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).
